description: this app is very easy to use and hack databases, this forsure helps me in my journey to becoming an ethical hacker

this is nothing i would install as a snap. get it off github instead and you get a recent version. 
if you learn something about sql injections, dont use it at all but rather understand what the tool automates and only use it for difficult cases for data extraction like blind, timing based injections
summary: useful but not as a snap
